attributes.action: Restrict the Lumens LED lights can have on Headlights on cars
attributes.background: LED Headlights on newer cars even on the regular light setting are a risk to health as they are blinding to drivers and passengers in oncoming vehicles. The Lumens need to be restricted to lower levels.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Ban LED vehicle headlights or regulate bulb wattage" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/744882
